title: Beauty Report with Amy Morrison 09.21.2017 - 07 PM
description:
We're featuring TRUHAIR, Luminess, Footnanny, Serious Skincare and more! Amy shares her latest beauty tips and trends. From hair and makeup to skincare and fragrance, it's new every week. 

Watch every Thursday at 7 pm ET. *Prices shown on the previously recorded video may not represent the current price. Visit http://www.hsn.com to view the current selling price.
